resources.string:
Hi and welcome to KuwindaBeta! 
 Our goal is to help you make the best decision when buying a product or hiring a service. We try to have the best review sites out there so that you can group them togther and search in all of them at once. We really apprecite your time and feedback and we are happy to answer any questions. Please start off by swiping left and creating your first Group/Category.
 
 Best,
The Kuwinda Team.
